duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead by example and promote Seabrook Core Values, Characteristics, Employee Constitution and Decision Making.
Assist Club Controller with General Ledger Reconciliations
Perform Bank Reconciliations each month, research and correct all outstanding items
Supports Club Controller with Financial Audit
Work with Operations to book monthly inventory
Input ACH all SIRE invoices and commission checks.
Support Controller with Banking Approval Process
Prepare monthly use and payments of Lakehouse transactions and give to Accounts Payable for payment.
Prepare credit applications / resale certificates for new vendors.
Add / modify all vendors in Jonas.
Submit W-9’s to vendors as needed
Move paid invoices to history in Jonas.
Complete any other tasks/special projects as assigned by the Club Controller
